const API_URL='http://localhost:4000';// Pastikan backend berjalan di port ini
export const login=async(username,password)=>{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});return response.json();};export const getProduk=async()=>{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/produk"));return response.json();};export const pesanProduk=async(idPembeli,idProduk,jumlah)=>{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/pesan"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({id_pembeli:idPembeli,id_produk:idProduk,jumlah})});return response.json();};
